name: Stick 'n' Bounce
description:
Stick 'N' Bounce is a unique physics based puzzler! Stick to spinning cogs and bounce off walls to reach your destination. Avoid the spiky surfaces and play through many fun and thoughtful puzzles!

Stick 'N' Bounce features:
• Simple and satisfying gameplay!
• Beautiful, mesmerising graphics!
• Unique and varied levels, you'll never get bored!
• No IAPs – Stick 'N' Bounce is a full game from the moment you download!
